Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.number = ..Number set proxy.training = ..Training.ConvertToProxyObject(1) set proxy.student = ..Student.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.date = $ZDATE(..CreatedDate, 3) set proxy.isPrinted = ..IsPrinted
quit proxy

Method.name: CreateAll
GenerateNumber
Method.Implementation:
set ddmmyy = $REPLACE($ZDATE(date, 4), "/", "") set $EXTRACT(ddmmyy, 5, 6) = ""
set maxNumber = 0
&sql(SELECT MAX(CONVERT(INTEGER, $PIECE(Number, '-', 2))) INTO :maxNumber FROM Stc_Data.Certificate WHERE $PIECE(Number, '-', 1) = :ddmmyy)
set maxNumber = maxNumber + 1
if (maxNumber < 10) set maxNumber = "0"_maxNumber
quit ddmmyy_"-"_maxNumber
